disp-quote.p: “I think a lot of data that we perhaps do not have access to and we simply do not get it, … is that community perception data, so what … does the community need? When do they think it is getting to the point that they cannot function well in a particular climate situation or particular emergency situation? That’s probably something we do not have enough of, we don’t have even systems really to do that well, that would be really valuable to have … it is more that perception data that we are not very good at gathering”.
